page.title: 19SUNNYHILL HOUSE SCHOOL
page.content: The Sunnyhill House School is in a large house at the bottom of Sunnyhill and Silcoates Lane.The children are aged between 3 years and 7 years old.There are approximately 83 children in the school.They stay at school from 9.00am to 3.15pm every day, except Wednesday afternoon when they have a free afternoon.They wear a uniform which is dark green.There are 4 classes and a teacher for each one.Before it was a school this building was a Dormitory for boarders from Silcoates School which is near by at the top of the hill.The school was built in the late 18th century.
